parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the node,type=1 means southbound node,type=2 means northbound node

schema.description: //The parameter fields in json fill in different fields according to different plugins

post.description: Please refer to [Plugin Setting](https://docs.emqx.com/zh/neuronex/latest/api/plugin-setting.html) for the configuration parameters of each plugin.

params.description: The parameter fields in json fill in different fields according to different plugins

rtt.description: average round trip time communicating with devices

decimal.description: optional, when the attribute is static

plugins.name: MQTT
plugins.description: Neuron northbound MQTT plugin bases on NanoSDK.
plugins.description_zh: 基于 NanoSDK 的 Neuron 北向应用 MQTT 插件

connection_mode.name: Connection Mode
connection_mode.description: Neuron as the client, or as the server
connection_mode.description_zh: Neuron 作为客户端或服务端

interval.name: Send Interval
interval.description_zh: 发送读指令时间间隔，单位为毫秒

host.name: IP Address
host.description: Local IP in server mode, remote device IP in client mode
host.description_zh: 服务端模式中填写本地 IP，客户端模式中填写目标设备 IP

port.name: Port
port.description: Local port in server mode, remote device port in client mode
port.description_zh: 服务端模式中填写本地端口号，客户端模式中填写远程设备端口号

timeout.name: Connection Timeout
timeout.description_zh: 连接超时时间，单位为毫秒

topic.description: optional, when using the MQTT plugin, the topic field needs to be added

params.description: when using the MQTT plugin, the topic field needs to be added

topic.description: when using the MQTT plugin, the topic key is the upload topic
optional, when using the MQTT plugin, the topic field needs to be added

params.description: optional, when using the MQTT plugin, the topic field needs to be added
when using the MQTT plugin, the topic field needs to be added

topic.description: when using the MQTT plugin, the topic key is the upload topoic

put.description: Call the api to modify the log level of the node to debug, and automatically switch to the default level in about ten minutes.

core.description: whether to switch the core log level.The core field is optional and defaults to true.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: filter with node name, only meaningful when `category=driver` or `category=app`

application/json.example:
# HELP core_dumped Whether there is any core dump
# TYPE core_dumped gauge
core_dumped 0
# HELP uptime_seconds Uptime in seconds
# TYPE uptime_seconds counter
uptime_seconds 314
# HELP north_nodes_total Number of north nodes
# TYPE north_nodes_total gauge
north_nodes_total 1
# HELP north_running_nodes_total Number of north nodes in running state
# TYPE north_running_nodes_total gauge
north_running_nodes_total 1
# HELP north_disconnected_nodes_total Number of north nodes disconnected
# TYPE north_disconnected_nodes_total gauge
north_disconnected_nodes_total 1
# HELP south_nodes_total Number of south nodes
# TYPE south_nodes_total gauge
south_nodes_total 1
# HELP south_running_nodes_total Number of south nodes in running state
# TYPE south_running_nodes_total gauge
south_running_nodes_total 0
# HELP south_disconnected_nodes_total Number of south nodes disconnected
# TYPE south_disconnected_nodes_total gauge
south_disconnected_nodes_total 1
# HELP send_msgs_total Total number of messages sent
# TYPE send_msgs_total counter
send_msgs_total{node="data-stream-processing"} 0
# HELP send_msg_errors_total Total number of errors sending messages
# TYPE send_msg_errors_total counter
send_msg_errors_total{node="data-stream-processing"} 0
# HELP recv_msgs_total Total number of messages received
# TYPE recv_msgs_total counter
recv_msgs_total{node="data-stream-processing"} 0
# HELP last_rtt_ms Last request round trip time in milliseconds
# TYPE last_rtt_ms gauge
last_rtt_ms{node="modbus"} 9999
# HELP send_bytes Total number of bytes sent
# TYPE send_bytes gauge
send_bytes{node="modbus"} 0
# HELP recv_bytes Total number of bytes received
# TYPE recv_bytes gauge
recv_bytes{node="modbus"} 0
# HELP tag_reads_total Total number of tag reads including errors
# TYPE tag_reads_total counter
tag_reads_total{node="modbus"} 0
# HELP tag_read_errors_total Total number of tag read errors
# TYPE tag_read_errors_total counter
tag_read_errors_total{node="modbus"} 0
# HELP group_tags_total Total number of tags in the group
# TYPE group_tags_total gauge
group_tags_total{node="modbus",group="grp"} 1
# HELP group_last_send_msgs Number of messages sent on last group timer invocation
# TYPE group_last_send_msgs gauge
group_last_send_msgs{node="modbus",group="grp"} 0
# HELP group_last_timer_ms Time in milliseconds consumed on last group timer invocation
# TYPE group_last_timer_ms gauge
group_last_timer_ms{node="modbus",group="grp"} 0

schema.description: The value is displayed only when the value is read correctly, when the value is read incorrectly, the error code is displayed, not the value.
The value is displayed only when the value is read correctly, when the value is read incorrectly, the error code is displayed, not the value.
Only perform reading tests, no need to actually add the tag. Not compatible with tag and node byte order, does not calculate decimal and offset.

post.description: Multiple tags writing currently only supports Mitsubishi 3E, Beckhoff ADS, Modbus TCP, Modbus RTU, Siemens S7 ISOTCP, Omron FINS TCP, OPC UA, BACnet/IP drivers.

schema.description: Multiple tags writing currently only supports Mitsubishi 3E, Beckhoff ADS, Modbus TCP, Modbus RTU, Siemens S7 ISOTCP, Omron FINS TCP, OPC UA, BACnet/IP drivers.
